abstract: The bank is lending more and reducing drags on capital. Yet its fourth-quarter return on equity was only 9 percent. New technology could bolster revenue and savings.
snippet: The bank is lending more and reducing drags on capital. Yet its fourth-quarter return on equity was only 9 percent. New technology could bolster revenue and savings.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase’s fourth-quarter results offer a compelling case for cranking up the industry’s use of financial technology.

headline.main: JPMorgan Results Offer Strong Case for Financial Technology
